thread.title: DEJILLO/JOSE LEONIDAS REFUGIO
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by DEJILLO/JOSE LEONIDAS REFUGIO

author: DEJILLO/JOSE LEONIDAS REFUGIO
title: DEJILLO/JOSE LEONIDAS REFUGIO
text: Lovely, our travel agent did an excellent job in facilitating our ticketing purchase from start to finish. She did an extra mile in making follow up calls trying to iron out minor problems till everything was complete. Kudos to Lovely for an excellent job!
